DOC.brief_summary: Biomarkers play key role diagnostic workup patient present emergency department ( ED ) . European American guideline recommend cardiac Troponin ( T I ) biomarker gold standard diagnosis non-ST-elevation myocardial infarction ( non-STEMI ) . Today , high-sensitivitiy assay available allow early diagnosis non-STEMI detection troponin individual would classify unstable angina former assay . As many patient detect elevated troponin value high sensitivity assay , specificity non-STEMI inevitably decrease . Micro-RNAs ( mi-RNA ) new biomarkers wide spectrum detectable condition allow specific identification myocardial infarction . The aim study develop biomarker protocol combine high sensitivity cardiac Troponin T high specificity mi-RNA profile early safe identification non-STEMI ED patient .
